(ooc: KSL, you didn't post damage for my characters! i expect to see you 
posting for a huge beam of plasma shot at Vehement (like Meg's G1 cannon), 
and another shot just like it shot at Injector, PLUS all the stuff im firing 
at u in this post!!!)


The two bee-bots that Rixer had released earlier detected alot of missiles 
heading for the Cybertronian Fire and for friendly bots. They spread out and 
each took a side of the Cybertronian Fire. Within several seconds their good 
aim had taken out all the missiles heading for the ship except for two which 
were too small, and an orb which went unnoticed. Satisfied at their success, 
they continued to stand watch over the ship. With them around, firing 
missiles at it would be hopeless! :)



Cledar and Forrior saw all the firepower being fired and identified all the 
extra targets. Cledar smiled and took careful aim with his cannon, firing 
another large stream of plasma at Vehement. Furrior changed his target, 
firing at Unicron this time. The blasts were probably too big to avoid, and 
they were as strong as Megatron's cannon in G1.



Rixer fired two more missiles as he continued running toward Predator, 
several plasma shots following behind them to hit the Predacon too.
